fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Succeed (Night): Choose a player. If they die tonight, you will gain one charge of all of their role's abilities and all of their attributes. You will not gain faction-specific attributes.
- Jack Your Style (Night, 1 use): Choose a player. You will gain all of their abilities and attributes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may use multiple abilities each night as long as the abilities come from different sources.
